definitions.definition: In crustaceans , the part of the side of a somite external to the basal joint of each appendage .
In insects , the lateral piece behind the episternum .

main_definition: ( zoology ) In crustaceans , the part of the side of a somite external to the basal joint of each appendage .
secondary_definitions: ( entomology ) In insects , the lateral piece behind the episternum .
